transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 👦 You ride me to school or in the park.
🛑 You use brakes to stop me.

transport.question: I travel on water and have sails. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ I'm good for a relaxing trip on the sea.

transport.question: I have wings and fly high in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I take people on long journeys.
🌍 I can fly to other countries.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🚝 You can hear a loud whistle when I arrive.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I drive on roads and deliver mail and packages. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I'm bigger than a car, but smaller than a truck.

transport.question: I zoom through space carrying astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I need a lot of fuel to fly.

transport.question: I travel underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You can avoid traffic jams by using me.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle used for emergencies and I'm very loud. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍⚕️ I help people who are sick or hurt.

transport.question: I carry goods over long distances on the water. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I transport many containers at once.

transport.question: I am a two-wheeled vehicle that uses a motor, but I'm not a motorcycle. What am I?

hints.text: 🔋 I can be charged at home.
⚡ I am friendly to the environment.
🚲 I use pedals but can also go without.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?
I hop and jump with strong legs. I chirp loudly in the grass. What am I?
I am small and black and work very hard. I carry crumbs back to my hill. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🍪 I like to eat sugary things.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and start as a caterpillar. I fly around and sip nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. I’m a beetle, and I light up at night! What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am often seen in the summer.
🌃 I shine brightest when it's dark.

bug.question: I build sticky webs to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?
I can be many colors and have spots on my back. Farmers like me because I eat aphids! What am I?
I suck blood and can be very annoying. I fly around and make a buzzing sound before I bite you! What am I?

hints.text: 🔈 I am known for my buzzing noise.

bug.question: I eat wood and can damage houses. I live in colonies and have a king and queen. What am I?
I shed my skin as I grow bigger. My shell is hard and protects me. Some people keep me as pets. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
